branchCategory.name: Other Vacuum Equipment
branchCategory.description: <p>Series SP adsorption plate was developed with an extremely flat surface to preserve the flatness of a workpiece surface, and adsorb without deforming. &nbsp;The ZCUK series is a non-rotating free mount cylinder &nbsp;for vacuum applications. The ZCUK was created by providing a vacuum passage in the rod of the CUK cylinder to enable a vacuum pad to be installed on the end of the rod. &nbsp;Series AMJ is effective for removing &nbsp;water droplets from the air sucked into vacuum pumps and ejectors. &nbsp;Series AMV exhaust cleaner separates and removes over 99.5% oil mist in compressed air and solid particles of more than 0.3&micro;m.</p>

branchItem.name: Adsorption Plate
branchItem.description: <p>Series SP adsorption plate was developed with an extremely flat surface to preserve the flatness of a workpiece surface, and adsorb without deforming. The SP adsorbs workpieces, and holds them without leaving wrinkles, air bubbles or marks, making the series ideal for adsorption and fixing in place thin sheets, glass, substrates, and soft workpieces. </p>

branchItem.name: Free Mount Cylinder for Vacuum
Drain Separator for Vacuum
Exhaust Cleaner for Vacuum
